description: Second-in-command of GoLion, Isamu pilots the Red Lion and wears a blue uniform. He is tall, wiry, and wily, and is approximately 21-23 years of age. Isamu is always joking and teasing others whenever he gets the chance. He is the only one in the group who contests any of Akira`s commands. He is also a ladies` man and a great pilot, though a bit too daring at times. "Kurogane" is based on the Japanese word for iron.
name: Kurogane Isamu
